chapters.title: Chapter 16: A Silence Like Screaming
chapters.info: Deepe Bhadar, p. 326—One of the Asha'man. He is the highest ranking among the Asha'man Rand granted to Rodel Ituralde, one of three who wore both the Dragon and the sword pins on his collar. He fought at Maradon under Lord Ituralde and survived. He grew up in Andor. He has a flat face and long, black hair. He shows no signs of the madness. Deepe later fought with Lan's army at Tarwin's Gap; he was killed in M'Hael's attack.
